    GetBounds(List<Vector2>, Vector4)

    Finds a 2D rectangle that encloses the entire list of points.

    Declaration
    public static Rect GetBounds(List<Vector2> aPoints, Vector4 aPadding = default(Vector4))
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    List<UnityEngine.Vector2> aPoints

    List of points to enclose.
    UnityEngine.Vector4 aPadding

    This padding is added to the final rectangle. Positive values will inflate size, negative values will shrink size. xMin-=x, yMax+=y, xMax+=z, yMin-=w
    Returns
    Type Description
    UnityEngine.Rect

    A rectangle enclosing the list of points, modified by the padding.
    | Improve this Doc View Source

    GetIntersections(Vector2, Vector2, List<Vector2>, Boolean, Boolean)

    Finds all the intersections of a closed line segment with a path.

    Declaration
    public static List<PathUtil.Intersection> GetIntersections(Vector2 aLineStart, Vector2 aLineEnd, List<Vector2> aPath, bool aClosed, bool aGetPoints)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    UnityEngine.Vector2 aLineStart

    Start of the intersection line.
    UnityEngine.Vector2 aLineEnd

    End of the intersection line.
    List<UnityEngine.Vector2> aPath

    The path to test for intersections on.
    Boolean aClosed

    Is the path closed, should we test the closing segment?
    Boolean aGetPoints

    Do we need to calculate the exact intersection points, or is just the segment info enough?
    Returns
    Type Description
    List<PathUtil.Intersection>

    A list of intersections. Intersection.segmentIndex is always filled in, Intersection.point is only filled if aGetPoints is true.

    IsInPoly(List<Vector2>, List<Vector2>)

    Checks if one closed polygon is inside, outside, or intersecting another closed polygon. No overlap is fast, but overlap invokes an O(n^2) intersection algorithm.

    Declaration
    public static PathUtil.PathSide IsInPoly(List<Vector2> aIsPoly, List<Vector2> aInPoly)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    List<UnityEngine.Vector2> aIsPoly

    Answer is with respect to this closed polygon.
    List<UnityEngine.Vector2> aInPoly

    Closed polygon to check against.
    Returns
    Type Description
    PathUtil.PathSide

    Is aIsPoly inside, outside, or intersectiong aInPoly?
    | Improve this Doc View Source

    SortPointsClockwise(ref List<Vector2>)

    Sorts a cloud of points into a clockwise order. The center of the cloud is determined by averaging the points.

    Declaration
    public static void SortPointsClockwise(ref List<Vector2> aPoints)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    List<UnityEngine.Vector2> aPoints

    A list of points that will be modified into a clockwise order around the averaged center.
    | Improve this Doc View Source

    SortPointsClockwise(ref List<Vector2>, Vector2)

    Sorts a cloud of points into a clockwise order around the provided center.

    Declaration
    public static void SortPointsClockwise(ref List<Vector2> aPoints, Vector2 aCenter)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    List<UnityEngine.Vector2> aPoints

    A list of points that will be modified into a clockwise order around the provided center.
    UnityEngine.Vector2 aCenter

    The center point of the circle, with which to sort the points around.
